edge_1: In January 2019, it was reported that King left the film due to 'family reasons' while Disney was announced to be searching for a new director for the project.
edge_2: In November 2018, Simon Farnaby was reported to have worked on a new draft for the film at Disney.

edge_1: On October 18, 2019, it was reported that Robert Zemeckis was in talks to direct the film for Disney.
edge_2: In November 2018, Simon Farnaby was reported to have worked on a new draft for the film at Disney.

edge_1: Both Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Keegan-Michael Key voice characters in the film.
edge_2: Joseph Gordon-Levitt (left), Keegan-Michael Key and Lorraine Bracco voice Jiminy Cricket, 'Honest' John Worthington Foulfellow and Sofia the Seagull.

edge_1: Both Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Lorraine Bracco voice characters in the film.
